title: Urgent Opening For IT Executive
tagsAndSkills: IT Infrastructure Management,IT Operations,IT Budgeting,IT,Tms,IT Security,Infrastructure management,Infrastructure

ambitionBoxData.Title: Algor Supply Chain Solutions Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  • Oversee the performance and availability of IT infrastructure, including servers, storage, networking equipment, and data canters.
  • Provide technical support for logistics software applications, collaborate with vendors for updates and troubleshooting, and ensure seamless software functionality.
  • Configure and maintain network devices such as routers, switches, and firewalls. Ensure network security and address connectivity issues. Monitor network traffic.
  • Implement and maintain security policies and procedures to safeguard company data. Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
  • Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting steps. Generate regular reports on system performance, uptime, and security.
  • Stay current with emerging technologies and trends in logistics and IT. Evaluate and recommend new technology solutions to improve logistics processes and efficiency.
  • Manage domain renewals and updates to ensure the company's online presence remains active and up-to-date.
  • Oversee the company's social media presence on platforms like LinkedIn and Facebook. Create and manage content to engage with the audience effectively.
  • Develop and coordinate email marketing campaigns, create visually appealing banners, and manage LinkedIn and Facebook advertising campaigns to promote the company's services.
  • Set up user accounts and retrieve information, including passwords and account usernames. Provide training to team members on software usage.
  • Manage and plan projects related to the systems. Educate company employees about computer security. Ensure that all elements of the system are working together properly.


Perks and benefits
